character_story: A talented researcher who loves nothing more than machines and knowledge. As the brain of Metis, she is both perceptive, whip-smart, and capable of producing weapons in flash.
A gearhead who gets a thrill from burning rubber. She sells sugar coffee in Café Sweety
character_skill1:
When Cover is attacked :
Gain Organic ATK +15% for 7 sec.
Gain Concentration +20% for 7 sec.

While in Full Burst, also cast :
Gain Reloading Speed +20% for 7 sec.
character_skill2:
When the effect is cast :
Gain Reload 3 rounds of ammunition.
Gain number of pellets +1 for 3 rounds.

According to the number of Café Sweety members in the Squad, also cast :
2 members Gain Energy ATK +5% for 8 sec.
3 members Gain Energy ATK +10% for 8 sec.
character_ultimate:
When the spell is cast :
Gain ATK Speed +50% for 10 sec.
Gain Concentration +70% for 10 sec

All allies Full Burst Time +5 sec.

character_story: A hacking wunderkind from Protocol. No one can hold a candle to her when it comes to video games.
An endearing individual who often indulges in fantasy, her ideas about the world are somewhat unique. From Unlimited, she spends her days looking for Rabbit.
Something of a big sister figure for Absolute, who enjoys taking care of others. Other will sometimes pick up on her carelessness.
A sadistic girl from Wardress. She can control others' senses, and she communicates by inflicting pain upon others.
character_skill1:
When shooting :
There is a 10% of the player casting Beast Mode on themselves.
Beast Mode: ATK +10% for 10 sec.

There is a 10% chance of casting.
Reloading Speed +10% for 10 sec.
To one enemy: Attract Fire for 10 sec.
character_skill2:
After firing 10 rounds of ammunition :
Steal 10% HP for 10 sec.
Gain DEF +10% for 10 sec.

Also cast on all enemies hit : DEF -10% for 10 sec.

When Beast Mode is on, gain an additional :
Steal 10% HP for 10 sec.
Gain DEF +10% for 10 sec.

When Beast Mode is cast, cast on all enemies hit after expending 10 rounds of ammunition : DEF -10% for 10 sec.
character_ultimate:
Cast on all enemies in a designated area :
Metal Damage 500%.

Enemy move forcibly to the location where the skill is cast.

character_story: A girl who puts on a hard front but in fact enjoys taking care of others. The most highly skilled member of Triangle.
character_skill1:
While in Full Burst :
Gain reload magazine +20.
Gain Metal ATK +10% for 5 rounds.
character_skill2:
After hitting the same enemy with 40 rounds, Lock-on for 5 sec.

When hitting an enemy who is locked-on :
Gain Metal Damage +20%.
Gain Steal 20% HP.
character_ultimate:
Metal Damage 500% on all enemies.

When hitting enemies who are locked-on :
Gains Metal ATK +20% for 10 sec.

Additional Metal Damage 150%.

character_story: The leader of Café Sweety. Her inherent laziness actually leads to her discorvering the most efficient ways to get things done. She sells cream coffe.
A puritanical pilgrim who wandes the surface in an effort to protect mankind. As a member of Pioneer, her days are spent dispatching Raptures with extreme prejudice.
A violinist whose life revolves around music. From Maestro, she use music as a way to express herself.
character_skill1:
When shooting :
There is a 10% chance of stacking up Dissonance on enemy hit.
Dissonance: DEF -1% Max Stack: 10 for 5 sec.

Gain Critical Rate +10% for 5 sec.
Gain Spread -10% for 5 sec.
character_skill2:
When the spell is cast :
Gain Burst ATK +2% Max Stack 5 for 10 sec.

Gain Organic Damage +10% for 5 sec.
Gain Critical Damage +50% for 5 sec.
character_ultimate:
Cast on all enemies True Damage 200%.

According to the number of Burst stacks, also cast on all enemies True Damage 20% x the number of Burst stacks.

Cast on enemy whose Dissonance reaches Max Stack : Lock-on for 5 sec.

character_story: A communicator for The Scouts, the best in her field. She is a big fan of soap operas, and is always harboring fantasies about torrid love affairs.

A Nikke form the A.C.P.U who has no lack of passion but sometimes falls short in her work performance. Despite her role as a supposedly secret A.C.P.U inspector, everyone is all to aware of her job story.
The leader of Zephyr who has a heart of gold. She always carries around a bag of strawberry candies and is helping guide lost passengers to their seats.
character_auto: Rapid Fire with the Gaitling Gun, dealing 10.02% current ATK Damage to the enemy.
character_skill1:
When the spell is cast :
Gain reload magazine +10.
Gain DEF +10 for 3sec.

Cast on one enemie Taunt : Force the relevant monster to attack the caster for 3 sec (enemy with the highest ATK).
character_skill2:
When attacked :
There is a 10% chance of Gain Strawberry Candy.

While in Full Burst :
After firing 50 rounds Gain Strawberry Candy.

Strawberry Candy : Magazine Capacity +2% (Max Stack : 6 for 10sec).

When Strawberry Candy is fully stacked Apply on all allies reload 90 % of ammunition
character_ultimate:
Metal Damage 350% on 5 enemy with the highest ATK and ATK -10% for 10 sec.

Gain Strawberry Candy: Magazine Capacity +2% (Max Stack : 6 for 10sec) Stack Up 4.

character_story: The leader of Absolute who gives off an air of  arrogance and composure. Her perfectionism has helped take Absolute to the pinnacle of success.
A hero who yearns to be a vilain. A part of Metis, she has the speacial abillity to detect radio waves using her body.
A talented doctor with an unsurpassed bedside manner. In Seraphim, she is know as the Angle in White. As for patients who disobey her orders however...
character_skill1:
When firing the last round of ammunition :
Apply on all allies CPR: Recover 1% HP Max Stack: 2 for 5 sec.

When CPR is fully stacked :
All allies recover 60% of Damage Taken HP takes effect continuously for 1 times of attack received.

character_story: A little girl from Triangle. Her time in the army has given her a maturity far beyond her years. Kittens are her favorite.

A girl from Extrinsic who is always off in her own world. She believes that she is destined to live her life in solitude. Who knows what thoughts are going through her mind, half-obscured by her eye patch?
A Nikke from Unlimited. She lives in the bitterly cold northern lands, where she saves Nikkes who have lost their way.
A member of Nepenthe who is a master at pulling off skateboarding tricks. She is revered among teenagers because of her no-nonsense and cool demeanor.
A wandering swordwswoman from Pioneer. Despite the common perception of melee weapons being ineffective in combat, she choose to wield a sword.
The so-called Strongest Shield on the Surface who protects Inherit. Has possessed great strenght ever since she was a child, which has led to her picking up some bad habits.
A troubled yet reliable girl who seeks to answer the quetion of just what Nikkes really are. From Counters, she always ensures harmonious relations between various members of the squad.
A rabid gun nut who thinks about nothing else. She is from Counters, but her true identity as a spy is an open secret.
The leader of The Scouts. Her professionalism as a soldier is reflected in the tactical competency of her squad.
character_skill1:
While in Full Burst :
Gain DEF +5% for 5 sec.

Cast on all enemies Shared Damage: Share the Pain for 5 sec.
character_skill2:
When firing the last round of ammunition :
Cast on one enemie Organic Damage 110% and ATK -5% for 3 sec.

character_story: A girl who know exactly how to survive in the callous world that surrounds her. Somewhere between the somber Rapi and off-the-wall Neon, she is fond of telling jokes to lighten the moood whenever things get tense.
A masochist from Wardress who is easy on the eyes. For her, feeling pain is the only way to truly feel alive. She and her squadmate Yuni are practically inseparable.
character_skill1:
When attacked :
There is a 10% chance of Gain ATK +5% x the percentage of HP Lost for 3 sec.

While in Full Burst :
Gain maximum HP +10% for 3 sec.
character_skill2:
When the spell is cast :
Gain DEF +10% x the percentage of HP Lost for 3 sec.

Cast on all enemies Taunt : force the relevant monster to attack the caster for 3 sec.
character_ultimate:
Cast on all enemies Metal Damage 200%.

When HP is higher than 35%, cast the effect :
Gain additional Metal Damage +30%.

When the effect is cast :
Gain ATK +10% x the percentage of HP Lost for 10 sec.

character_story: A Nikke from Recall & Release. She is outgoing and energetic, but inexplicably feels a sense of emptiness inside herself.
A mad scientist who believes that science is the domain of man. She can often be seen carrying out all manner of experiments. She is in charge of overseeing the lives of her fellow M.M.R members.
The leader of The Carronades. She possesses above-average intelignet and has a soft spot for pulling pranks and flirtation.
A Nikke from The Carronades. Extremely naive. Her sole friend Belorta is the only one she will fully trust without any hesitation.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Elysion, collectively known as model EG.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Elysion, collectively known as model FA.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the Series 8 mass-produced Nikke models developed by Missilis.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the Series 12 mass-produced Nikke models developed by Missilis.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Tetra, collectively known as Flower.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Tetra, collectively known as Ocean.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Elysion, collectively known as O.W.
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the Series 23 mass-produced Nikke models developed by Missilis
A Nikke from The Renplacements. One of the mass-produced Nikke models developed by Tetra, collectively known as Sun.
